memberships.title: Single Membership
memberships.text: Inlcudes one full month of unlimited classes for one indvidual.

memberships.title: Family Membership
memberships.text: Inlcudes one full month of unlimited classes for the member plus one family member.

memberships.title: Student Membership
memberships.text: Includes one full month of unlimited classes for one full-time student.
